# Imports

## Libraries

```{r}
library(data.table)
```


## Importing data

```{r}
getwd()
seg.raw <- read.csv('data/archive/sales.csv')
seg = as.data.table(seg.raw)
View(seg)
is.data.table(seg)
```

# Introductory clustering

Let's cluster the sales basing on the year:

```{r}
mode(seg$date)
colnames(seg)
seg_year = seg[, .(mean(views), mean(price_cost), mean(price_retail)), by=substr(date, 1, 4)]
head(seg_year)
```

```{r}
seg.summ = function(data, groups){
  aggregate(data, list(groups), function(x){
    mean(as.numeric(x))
  })
}
seg.summ(seg.raw, seg.raw$date[1:4])
```
